Balraj Goulikar wrote:
> Hi All,
> 
> Had a query about getting JUnit reports in word document format. There is an
> ant task to get it in html but not in rtf or word document. Any way to
> convert that?

Didn't we already answer that? Word can open HTML documents 
automatically. If you need it in Word format, then Save As...
